destinations.title: Espresso
destinations.description: A strong and rich coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans.

destinations.title: Cappuccino
destinations.description: A perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and foam.

destinations.title: Latte
destinations.description: Smooth espresso with a generous amount of steamed milk.

destinations.title: Mocha
destinations.description: A chocolate-flavored coffee drink that combines espresso, milk, and cocoa.

destinations.title: Americano
destinations.description: Espresso diluted with hot water for a lighter taste.

destinations.title: Macchiato
destinations.description: Espresso marked with a small amount of frothy milk.
